author: shenloken2

text:
I hope Sony and Microsoft spend the next year thinking how best to unveil their next consoles, if those announcements will even be next year that is. There's so much potential for hype that's been going to waste. I'd have got about the same level of hype watching a few trailers at my leisure, instead of watching E3. 

I'm not going to get all hyperbolic about it, it just wasn't the spectacle we expected. The games will have to speak for themselves.

author: MetalMayhem007

text: Well the major E3 conferences are over (still need to see Nintendo's 3DS presentation) but I can say I was disapointed this year. Microsoft and Sony had very safe but boring conferences (action / shooter games overdose) and Nintendo was just plain underwhelming after our big and justified expectations. The winner? Ubisoft and by a landslide. Which is why I thought now would be a good time to upload a track from their first defining game. I wish there was an extended version.
author: SupraDarky
